hero.name: I'M Nebiyu
hero.text: Hello, I'm a Full-Stack Web Developer passionate about building secure, scalable applications with React, Django, and .NET.

projects.name: UNICEF-Supported Water Billing System
projects.description: A government water billing and customer management system built with .NET and Angular.
details: Tech Stack: .NET 8, Angular 16, SQL Server, Entity Framework Core, JWT
Role: Full-Stack Developer
Duration: 6 months
Features: Automated bill calculation, PDF receipt generation, secure APIs with JWT authentication, Angular dashboards with charts, deployed on IIS with SSL configuration

projects.name: Temp AI Internship Matching Platform
projects.description: An AI-powered internship matching platform for Ethiopia with resume scoring and role-based access.
details: Tech Stack: React, Tailwind CSS, Chart.js, Django Rest Framework, OpenRouter API
Role: Lead Full-Stack Engineer
Duration: 4 months
Features: Automated resume scoring, modular backend with RBAC, responsive frontend with data visualizations, JWT authentication, Swagger API docs

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website v2
projects.description: A modern portfolio website built with React and Vite.
details: Tech Stack: React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, EmailJS, Formik & Yup
Role: Front-End Developer
Duration: 1 week
Features: Responsive design, multilingual support, light/dark mode, secure contact form validation, deployed to Vercel

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website v1
projects.description: A modern portfolio website built with React and Vite.
details: Tech Stack: React, Vite, CSS, JavaScript
Role: Front-End Developer
Duration: 1 week
Features: Responsive design, interactive skills slider, contact form validation with Formik & Yup, EmailJS integration, deployed to Vercel

projects.name: Telegram Bot Development (Django)
projects.description: A Telegram group control and payment bot built with Django and integrated with Chapa API.
details: Tech Stack: Django, MongoDB, Chapa API, Python, Telegram API
Role: Backend Developer
Duration: 3 months
Features: Group management and restrictions, payment integration with Chapa API, Telegram Web App interface, webhook synchronization, Python test classes

qa.question: What was your primary role?
qa.answer: I served as a Backend Django Developer, building scalable systems for group management and community payments.

qa.question: What technologies did you use?
qa.answer: Django, Python, MongoDB, Chapa API, Telegram API.

qa.question: What were your key responsibilities?
qa.answer: Developed Telegram bot logic, enforced group guidelines, integrated Chapa for payments, implemented webhooks, and wrote test classes.

qa.question: What was a major achievement?
qa.answer: Successfully collaborated with a team to deliver a bot used by the public.

qa.question: What was your role?
qa.answer: I worked as a Full-Stack Developer, building secure enterprise web applications for government clients.

qa.question: What technologies were involved?
qa.answer: .NET 8, Angular, SQL Server, Entity Framework Core, JWT, IIS.

qa.question: What tasks did you handle?
qa.answer: Designed relational database schemas, exposed scalable RESTful APIs, implemented JWT authentication, and deployed production apps with SSL.

qa.question: What was a key accomplishment?
qa.answer: Developing the UNICEF-supported government water billing system (Wuha Limat Billing Software).

contact.title: Contact
contact.message: I'm excited to collaborate on innovative projects! Feel free to reach out to discuss opportunities or ideas.
